description: Modify the configuration of the current user. The current user is the user got from the ZAPI_KEY or the user logged by the WebGUI.

zapikey.description: Each user can have a zapikey. With this zapikey, the user can do action through the zapikey with the permissions of the userâ€™s role.

zapi_permissions.description: The possible values are: true, to enable the access to the load balancer through the ZAPI; or false, to deny the access through the ZAPI.

password.description: It is the current user password. It is required when newpassword is sent.

newpassword.description: New user password to access through the WebGUI.
newpassword.format_msg: must contain at least a letter and a number and a minimum length of 8 characters.
